name: Casa al Sole

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is on the main road in Greve in Chianti just a few minutes walk from the main square and looks quite new and uninviting from the outside. However, once you enter the hotel you can see that the owners really care for this place and have given it character and a real sense of homeliness. We were on a cycling holiday and our bags had arrived before us and the staff / owners were very friendly and welcoming, and had ensured that our bags had been taken to our rooms, which I thought was a nice touch. Our bikes were locked away behind a metal door within the confines of the hotel. Our room had a balcony, was very clean, had a safe and minibar as well as having it’s own individual character with lovely pictures on the wall. There was also wi-fi internet connection in the room for a fixed price of 5 Euros for our stay.
reviews.title: A little gem in Tuscany

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The whole hotel was filled with curios from around the world, but not in a brick-a-brack way, really interesting pieces that you could see had been chosen specifically for the place in which it was on display. There were lots of plants as well given the place a real homely, welcoming feel.
reviews.title: Nothing wrong with this hotel

likes.liked: — Location, friendliness, cyclist friendly, rooms, good internet access
